game.name: Five Nights at Freddy's
game.shortDescription: Welcome to your new summer job at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza, where kids and parents alike come for entertainment and food! The main attraction is Freddy Fazbear, of course; and his two friends. They are animatronic robots, programmed to please the crowds!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to your new summer job at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza, where kids and parents alike come for entertainment and food! The main attraction is Freddy Fazbear, of course; and his two friends. They are animatronic robots, programmed to please the crowds!

reviewHighlights.text: 프레디의 피자가게는 주인공 '마이크 슈미트' 의 시점에서 시작합니다. 날이 갈수록 애니매트로닉스 들 의 공격은 거세지고 의지할 것 이라고 는 전화 너머의 남자와 CCTV, 그리고 문 두 짝. 살아남으실 수 있겠습니까?
